greeting:
Hi there! Thank you for visiting my site.

Let me tell you a little about myself. I am from a small village at the coast of Finnmark and I have been living in Oslo for over 10 years.  I decided to change my path during covid and started at Noroff, studying online frontend-development part-time. The last year I have taken the course full time and graduated in June 2024.

When I am not coding, I love to camp, fish, crochet amigurumis, run and spend a lot of time with my dog, my fianc√© and my friends.
noroff: Vocational school education in front-end development at Noroff
oslomet: Bachelors degree in Art, Design and Crafts Teacher at OsloMet
project-info-artful: This project was to create an auction website, where users can add items to be bid on and bid on items other users have put up for auction. The backend is from Noroff API.
project-info-holidaze: My final exam was to create an accommodation booking site, with both a customer and an admin-facing side. I chose to learn Next.js and used the App Router. The backend is from Noroff API.
project-info-omni: In this project I used React to create an eCom store, where I got to know Redux a bit. The backend is from Noroff API.
skills-set: Curious, Creative, Quick Learner, Eye for Design, Team Player, Passionate, Adaptable, User-Focused
uia: Annual Study in Communication at UiA
